name: Drift Max Speed- Car Racing
description:
Drift Max Speed- Car Racing is a drift based rally game and not a traffic racer. Drive with hill climb, asphalt drift, and real dirt drift. Rally with drift together. Have fun with drifty and realistic tuned physics with detailed graphics, vehicles and racing tracks.
Features
1. Amazing gameplay and graphics
2. Super challenging levels
3. Many cars to drive and customize
4. Outclass touch and tilt controls
5. Addictive drifting game
